item.title: New Website
item.description:
As you can see, I have just published a (long overdue) new website.

It is simple to maintain markdown stuff.

Details

For simplicity and security reasons I decided to use a static website generator for the entire website.

Let us know how you like the new page and don’t hesitate to contact me for any questions or feedback.

Yours X Y
